title: NFT Art Launch Party
description: Join us for an immersive evening launching our new NFT collection. Experience art in VR and meet digital artists.

title: Art & Wine Pairing Evening
description: Experience curated wine selections paired with specific artworks. Includes sommelier and art curator discussions.

title: Midnight Gallery: Art After Dark
description: Late-night art viewing with live DJ, light installations, and interactive projections. Experience art after hours.

title: Children's Art Adventure
description: Interactive art session for kids aged 6-12. Includes storytelling, painting, and sculpture making.

title: Art & Mental Wellness Workshop
description: Combine art therapy and mindfulness practices. Led by art therapist Emma Wilson.

title: Photography in Motion
description: Street photography workshop ending with instant gallery showing. Equipment provided.

title: Art & Music Fusion Night
description: Live painting performance synchronized with classical music orchestra. A multi-sensory experience.

title: Breakfast with Artists
description: Informal breakfast meeting with resident artists. Includes behind-the-scenes studio tours.

title: Sustainable Art Festival
description: Day-long festival featuring recycled art, eco-friendly workshops, and sustainable art market.

title: Virtual Reality Art Creation
description: Create artwork in VR with professional artists. No experience needed, all equipment provided.

title: Art of Food Photography
description: Learn food styling and photography. Includes gourmet lunch and photo editing session.

title: New Year's Art Gala
description: Annual black-tie event featuring live auctions, performances, and champagne reception.
